system.description:
Demons that were once balyan. Wields giant monk staffs that have been shattered. Prods demons to burn with a greater violence.

(The stats provided here is for a Rank 1 encounter. Check the book for higher ranks.)
system.attacks:
Inflict Violence: Rancid Consecration. Attack all enemies in an area (burst 2) with Faith and all unoccupied tiles are set aflame until the end of the Resound.

Gambit [[/r d12]]

1-3: Rush > Inflict Violence > Rush

4-6: Rush > Inflict Violence > Feed Corpse [1]: Heal 1 an ally in range 4.

7-9: Rush > Obscenities Against The Deva [2]: Choose 1 demon in the battlefield. They may immediately fester and then inflict violence if they can. Else, they may rush.

10-12: Rush > Antigod Field [2]: Put down a burst 1 Antigod Field in range 3. All demons that enter or start their riff in that field gain +2d to their next attack.

traits.name: Fester
traits.description: At the start of Resound 2+, all demons fester: their unique trait triggers and they gain +1d to all attacks until the end of the Resound. They fester every start of Resound afterwards.

traits.name: Atrocious Residue
traits.description: When a Demon is Defeated, they discorporate and roll 1 Attack Die on all enemies in the battlefield. Unless the battlefield is purified or cleansed by proper rituals, they will rise again after eighty seven days.

traits.name: Violent Devil God
traits.description: At the start of a Resound, if there are exactly 3 demons left in the battlefield, they may combine into a Violent Devil God: choose one demon as the main body. Add all remaining HP together, and the main body gains +1 to all Prowesses and becomes Size 3.

traits.name: Antigod
traits.description: All demons are vulnerable to anything that might sear away corruption and darkness.

traits.name: Putrid Salinity
traits.description: All allies in burst 2 of the corrupted monk cannot suffer status effects that they do not want to. When the Corrupted Monk festers, they heal 1 all allies in the battlefield.
